thread.section_title: Balmoral Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fab family Break
thread.title_full: Fab family Break - Review of Balmoral Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: HBrigden
title: Fab family Break
text: Booked this hotel for half term break with our 13 year old twins. The family room (suite) was excellent with effectively 2 rooms connected by a short corridor. Facilities very good - coffee machine a god send. Staff were very helpful when needed but discreet when you didn't need them! Location is brilliant - a short walk to the arc de triumph. Loads of local cafes, restaurants and little shops near by. Would highly recommend.
